item.title: EP 220 - The Phantom Of The Opera: A Deadly Reality?
item.itunes:title: The Phantom Of The Opera: A Deadly Reality?
item.description:
Today we meet the biggest coke dealer in America, and then we journey to France to uncover the truth of the Phantom Of The Opera!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Judge approves unusual court transportation plan for defendant who weighs more than 900 pounds

https://www.richmond.com/news/local/crime/judge-approves-unusual-court-transportation-plan-for-defendant-who-weighs/article_ec5e923d-ddbe-549c-aebd-4caea18556be.html

 

is 'Phantom.." a true story?

http://www.online-literature.com/forums/showthread.php?15118-is-Phantom-quot-a-true-story

 

The Phantom of the Opera: Fact or Fiction?

https://seeksghosts.blogspot.com/2014/01/the-phantom-of-opera-fact-or-fiction.html

 

The Truth About The Phantom of the Opera

http://mentalfloss.com/article/63836/truth-about-phantom-opera

 

Christina Nilsson

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christina_Nilsson

 

Gaston Leroux

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaston_Leroux

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
